segment.source: This section contains user experience guidelines for presenting app settings and storing those settings as app data.
segment.target: This section contains user experience guidelines for presenting app settings and storing those settings as app data.

segment.source: This section contains user experience guidelines for presenting app settings and storing those settings as app data.
segment.target: This section contains user experience guidelines for presenting app settings and storing those settings as app data.

segment.source: App settings are the user-customizable portions of your Universal Windows Platform (UWP) app.
segment.target: App settings are the user-customizable portions of your Universal Windows Platform (UWP) app.

segment.source: For example, a news reader app might let the user specify which news sources to display or how many columns to display on the screen.
segment.target: For example, a news reader app might let the user specify which news sources to display or how many columns to display on the screen.

segment.source: App data is data that the app itself creates and manages.
segment.target: App data is data that the app itself creates and manages.

segment.source: It includes runtime state, app settings, reference content (such as the dictionary definitions in a dictionary app), and other settings.
segment.target: It includes runtime state, app settings, reference content (such as the dictionary definitions in a dictionary app), and other settings.

segment.source: App data is tied to the existence of the app and is only meaningful to that app.
segment.target: App data is tied to the existence of the app and is only meaningful to that app.

segment.source: Best practices for creating and displaying app settings.
segment.target: Best practices for creating and displaying app settings.

segment.source: How to store and retrieve local, roaming, and temporary app data.
segment.target: How to store and retrieve local, roaming, and temporary app data.
